snippet.title: Are roof tiles nailed to the roof
snippet.description: yes they are all nailed, they come either pre drilled or you use a tile hammer which has a "pick like end to make an indent for your nailing position, the next shingle is then placed over the nail to

snippet.title: How do you roof a valley of a roof
snippet.description: a weaved valley: you run one shingle at least 6inches past the valley onto the opposite side of the valley from each side all the way up alternating them each time so they overlap like a weave on to

snippet.title: How do you roof a hip roof
snippet.description: u lay your shingels level to the hip and cut the excess diagonal off then cover the hip after each side is roofed with a "cap"

snippet.title: How do you tie a roof into another roof
snippet.description: the nails "picking" them back to where you want to "tie in the roof", it is very simple just take your time
